document_data.name: Mother Tara
document_data.mainbody: '''Mother Tara''' was a cheery [[halfling]] from the [[Vilhon Reach]], who owned [[Mother Tara's Festhall]] in [[Shadowdale]].
document_data.Description: Tara had dark curly hair which was graying.
document_data.Personality: She held the deed on a house next to her festhall known as [[Mane's Manor]], and would rent the place out to adventurers or other large parties. In all her operations, Mother Tara managed aboveboard and honest establishments, keeping her reputation intact.
document_data.History: Around [[1374 DR]], the [[Zhentarim]] took control of Shadowdale and all establishments, including Tara's festhall and manor.
